name: LD49 - Elemental Slime
description:
• There are three types of element: fire, water, ice.
    • damage depends on how many element value you have.
    • fire attack ice makes 2x damage, ice attack water makes 2x damage, water attack fire makes 2x damage, also attacker will takes 1x damage.
  • There is anther special element: void. only your character has void element. You can swallow other’s element if you are void.
  • the number on the top of character:
    • enemy: it means element value, enemy will die if the number is zero.
    • your character: it means your character’s element value, max value is 4, your character will become void element if the number is zero.
  • the number on the left bottom of character:
    • enemy: do not have this number.
    • your character: it means your character's hit point, max value is 20. It reduces when you swallow, attack, being attacked.

Controls

  • WSAD/Arrow Keys: move or interact with object/other slime
  • R: restart current level

PS

  • There are some bugs. If you stuck in game, try press ‘R’ button to restart current level. I will fixed them in a post jam version, maybe
